marklogic.body:
So let me get this straight...the Zimmerman supporters want me to believe that Trayvon Martin was 240 pounds and slamming Zimmerman's head into the concrete multiple times before he was shot.....yet Zimmerman decided to "sleep it " before going to the hospital for what would have been, according to the Zimmerman supporters, a traumatic brain injury?
If you've taken that kind of injury to your head, the police will insist you go to the hospital, if not outright force you to go to the hospital.Â People with concussions (like, supposedly, Zimmerman) can't Always think straight and any competent authority (law or medical) would have immediately had him sent to the hospital to check for brain damage.Â If Zimmerman's injuries were that severe, why did the police let him go while he was Bleeding out the back of the head?
